column3: so now the name of this restaurant makes all the sense in the world... they named it Snooze because after you eat all that delicious food
column4: you're bound to go back home and fall into a deep
column5: pleasurable sleep! I don't even know where to begin. SMH. First
column6: we both had a breakfast cocktail. I had a peach mimosa but I can't recall what he had. What I do know is that they were both great. We got the OMG French Toast
column8: spinach and cheese and our waiter brought out something additional for us which was the cinnamon roll pancake. Everything was awesome.
